content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 8, "index": 41}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft end_stone_brick_stairs, I need to craft end_stone_bricks first. End_stone_bricks require two end_stones on top of each other in the crafting grid, so I will first move one end_stone from slot 41 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]
thought: I have already placed one end_stone in the crafting grid, so now I will place another end_stone on top of it. I will do this by moving an end_stone from slot 41 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]
thought: The end_stone_bricks can be crafted by placing two more end_stones below the existing ones. Therefore, I will move an end_stone from slot 41 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 44}]

thought: I have crafted four end_stone_bricks. Since these are not the final goal, I will store them in my inventory, so that I can use them later to craft end_stone_brick_stairs. I will move them from the craft slot (0) to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft end_stone_brick_stairs, I need to first craft end_stone_bricks. The end_stone_bricks require placing 2 end_stones side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the end_stone from slot 41 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1
